# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: What are the goals for the front end team for current year?

Відповідь: 1. Improve user experience and enhance front-end performance
2. Work with other teams to make sure a consistent design language across the product
3. Create mobile-first interfaces and experiences
4. Integrate technologies such as React, Angular and Vue.js
5. Develop and maintain UI component libraries
6. Develop unit tests for front end code
7. Improve code structure and quality
8. Develop responsive designs
9. Leverage new web technologies for improved experiences
10. Research and develop ideas for new product features and projects
